questions.text: Match the following terms related to virtual circuit switching with their corresponding descriptions.
right: A unique identifier used to distinguish different virtual circuits within the same network
The phase where resources are allocated and the path is established before data transmission
The phase where the virtual circuit is terminated and resources are released
The process of replacing the incoming label with the outgoing label in a packet-switched network

questions.text: In a network where a host needs to send an IP packet to another host on the same subnet, the sender must first resolve the destination IP address to a MAC address using ARP. If the sender's ARP cache is empty and the ARP request is sent as a broadcast, and the destination host responds with a unicast ARP reply, calculate the total number of data link layer frames transmitted on the LAN for this single IP packet delivery assuming no retransmissions. Answer: _______
Which of the following HTTP methods is primarily used for retrieving a resource from the server?
